Infinite Ulysses
Follow me:

Digital humanities bloggage

Dr. Amanda Visconti designs, prototypes, & studies digital interface UX for a more public digital humanities, with interests in community design & meaningful crowdsourcing, web annotation, games & experimental design, and social reading & learning. I ground my work on a strong research background (Literature PhD, Information MS) in human-computer interaction, info science, & digital humanities.

Contact me to collaborate, or check out my online portfolio & resume & Twitter.
